title: Error to update
body:
Why Does my league client keep failing to update
it started doing this  patch 7.15   (the Urgot Rework) update and it goes to a percentage like its updating normally and then randomy give an error that it failed for an unspecific reason and askes to update again but it still doesnt work.

i waited a day and it still isnt updating what do I do! im so annoyed with this because i dont know why its failing!

replies.body: Are you st ill on the legacy client?  This error can be caused by different reasons and depending on when it occurred.  At what percent did you receive the error?
